fields.summary: Add GenericTestUtils.getTestDir method and use it for temporary directory in tests

fields.description:
In MAPREDUCE-6584, Jenkins reported license error for {{location/debugout}}, which is created by {{TestTaskLog}}.
The test should create a file under {{target/test-dir}} and remove the file after the test.
fields.summary: TestTaskLog outputs a log under directory other than target/test-dir
